title: Cecil Payne Stadium
text: Cecil Payne Stadium is a <a href="multi-purpose%20stadium">multi-purpose stadium</a> located in <a href="Roodepoort%2C%20Gauteng">Roodepoort</a>, a <a href="suburb">suburb</a> of <a href="Johannesburg">Johannesburg</a>, <a href="South%20Africa">South Africa</a>. It is currently used mostly for <a href="Association%20football">football</a> matches and is set to be utilized as a training field for teams participating in the <a href="2010%20FIFA%20World%20Cup">2010 FIFA World Cup</a> after being brought up to <a href="FIFA">FIFA</a> standards.
